author: lektran
msg: Changed one of the mini cart's column header labels from Nbr to Qty (makes more sense to me)

author: jacopoc
msg: Applied patch from Sumit Porwal, with some changes I did, (OFBIZ-1632 "Refactor the getGlAccountFromAccountType minilang method so that all the entity-one calls are replaced by calls to minilang (inline) methods.") and patch from Rashko Rejmer (OFBIZ-1631, "Replace all the code that directly retrieves from the db a PartyAcctgPreference for an organizationPartyId with a call to the service implemented in OFBIZ-1630"); misc cleanups to gl forms and screens; implemented new service to manually run the mappings for acctg trans entries (useful also to test the gl setup for automatic transactions).

author: pamarcelot
msg: Updated documentation. Changed the release date for the 1.1.0 release. Updated the version of the updated plugins.
